pros: It is close to home. It is a small facility with good personnel.

review_title: educational and has given me insight to how healthcare works
job_title: Financial Analyst in New Rochelle, NY
pros: very nice people that go out of their way to help both patients and coworkers
cons: healthcare in general has been taking a hit with current economy and now new medical care laws will benefit patients that need it but hospitals and insurance companies are going scrambling to make ends meet

review_title: Overall, a good facility, with skilled, conscientious employees and board certified physicians
pros: It is an easy commute, has free parking.  The employees are terriffic, and great to work with.  The hospital provides excellent clinical care for a community hospital.  Should get better after we get through bankruptcy, and the sale with Montefiore Medical Center is completed.
cons:
No pension (should change with Montefiore takeover)
No raises (should change with Montefiore takeover)
No growth opportunities (should change with Montefiore takeover)
